events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to return it for a full refund as soon as possible.
The case was reviewed and classified under the 'Refund' cluster based on the customer's request for a return and money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and communicate with the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that you received the wrong item. I’m here to assist you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
My order number is 987654321, and I have attached a photo showing that the product I received is definitely not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will send you a prepaid return label immediately and issue a full refund once we receive the item back.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions for the return process.
The refund has been processed and you should see the amount reflected on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything is now satisfactory regarding your order.
Since the refund was successful and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
